glsa.title: PEAR Archive_Tar: Remote code execution vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in the PEAR module Archive_Tar might allow local or remote attacker(s) to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: This class provides handling of tar files in PHP.

description.p: An issue was discovered in the PEAR module Archive_Tarâ€™s handling of file paths within Tar achives.

impact.p: A local or remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: Avoid handling untrusted Tar files with this package until you have upgraded to a non-vulnerable version.

resolution.p: All PEAR-Archive_Tar users should upgrade to the latest version:
